facts.text: 783 million people lack access to clean water globally
Every minute, one garbage truck of plastic enters our oceans
80% of wastewater flows back into ecosystems without treatment
Water-related diseases kill more people annually than war
By 2025, half of the world's population will live in water-stressed areas
Agriculture accounts for 70% of global freshwater withdrawals
A single oil spill can contaminate millions of gallons of water
Clean water and sanitation could prevent 1.4 million child deaths annually
Microplastics have been found in 83% of tap water samples worldwide
Investing in water and sanitation returns $4 for every $1 spent
